script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: This is Azure Burst. I'm one mile out from the Northwest reactor.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Keep going, but watch out for resistance.
Alarms are going off throughout the ship, seems like they've detected at least one of you.
Their sensors don't seem to be able to pick you up directly, but my guess is since they're here for your symbiotes they have some way of tracking them.

script.speaker: HorizonDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: I'm in position at the central reactor.
Waiting on both your signals.

script.speaker: KabadraDialogue
script.name: Kabadra
lines: Just don't go blowing things up too early.
I don't want to have aliens crawling up my ass while I'm saving your friends, gorgeous.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Maybe if you'd told me you were expecting a hostile invasion instead of trying to brainwash me we wouldn't be in this mess.
Just a thought, cupcake.

script.speaker: KabadraDialogue
script.name: Kabadra
lines: No one asked you, red!

script.speaker: HorizonDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: ENOUGH!
We can bicker about this later. Right now we have a flagship to torch.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: ...Yes, ma'am.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Heads up, Bursty, on your twelve!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: ...Bursty?

script.speaker: KabadraDialogue
script.name: Kabadra
lines: She does that.

script.speaker: Mystery2Dialogue
lines: YOUR FOOOLISH RESSSISSSTANCE WILL NOT GO UNPUNISSSHHHED...

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: I've reached the target. Permission to light it up?

script.speaker: HorizonDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: The central reactor has been destroyed. Moving towards the second target now. Go hot.

script.speaker: KabadraDialogue
script.name: Kabadra
lines: Hurk... little busy here!

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Permission granted. We're still on schedule.
Just be carefule. Enemy forces are moving in to protect the reactor.

script.speaker: Mystery2Dialogue
lines: CEASSSE THIS AT ONCCCE!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Northwest reactor is toast.
Moving to the data core now.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Belay that, Bursty.
Kabby needs help to rescue the prisoners.

script.speaker: HorizonDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: I'm closer. I'll pull back and cover Kabadra. Azure Burst, take the Northeast reactor.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: On it!

script.speaker: Mystery2Dialogue
lines: THIS SSSHIP WILL BE YOUR GRAAAVE.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: You planning to just whisper in my ear the whole time like a creep or are you going to show yourself?

script.speaker: CommanderDialogue
script.name: Qal Akesh
lines: YOU'RE PRRROVING QUITE THE THORN IN MY SSSIDE, TRRRAITOR.
I'LL ENJOY CARRRVING UP YOUR MEMBRRRANE AND ASSSSSIMILATING IT. RIGHT AFFFTER I'VE FINISSSHED WITH YOUR WEAK NEW VESSSSEL.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: How charming. Think I'll pass, though.

script.speaker: CommanderDialogue
script.name: Qal Akesh
lines: SSSTOP THIS FOOLISSSHNESS NOW, TRRRAITOR.
IF YOU DEFFFILE THE FINAL RRREACTOR, THIS SSSHIP WILL TAKE YOU AND YOUR VESSSSEL DOWN WITH IT.
JUSSST SSSUBMIT.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: In case you haven't noticed by now, I'm not exactly the submissive type.
Kitty, I've arrived at the final reactor, taking it down now!

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: The prisoners are free and on their way out, so you're clear to fire.
Stay frosty, more hostiles closing to defend the reactor.

script.speaker: CommanderDialogue
script.name: Qal Akesh
lines: UNDERSSSTAND THAT YOUR ACTIONSSS HAVE CONSSSEQUENCCCES, TRRRAITOR.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Reactor down!
It might be a little tight, but I think I can make it to the data core before this places comes down.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Ignore the data! A large squadron of enemies has left the ship and are heading towards the city.
Kabby and Horizon are still getting the others to safety, you're the only one free to pursue!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Shit! What's the closest exit?

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Through the damn hull.
